title: Much Ado About Nothing and Mac Studio
description:
Marques and Andrew go over the Nothing Phone 1 announcement (if you can call it that) and give some final thoughts on the new Apple Mac Studio and Studio Display. They wrap it up by going over the results of our Twitter poll where you all guessed what phone Andrew ended up getting to replace his old Pixel 4xl!

Links:
Mac Studio review: https://bit.ly/MacStudioReview
Studio Display review: https://bit.ly/StudioDisplayReview
Apple iPad Air M1 review: https://bit.ly/iPadAirM1Review
